text: "Trust" is a song by American thrash metal band Megadeth. It is on their seventh studio album, Cryptic Writings. It was released on May 8, 1997. There are two different versions of the song: one in English, and one in Spanish. == Charts == Chart (1997) Top position == References == Category:1997 songs Category:Megadeth songs
title: Trust (Megadeth song)
